# tag

**Instance Property**

The integer tag of the selected menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tag: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

If no item is selected, the value in this property is `0`.

## Related Documentation

- **tag**: Returns the receiver’s tag.
